summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer specializing in React, Node.js, TypeScript, AWS, and Web3, with a passion for developing scalable, high-performance applications. Proven track record of delivering impactful solutions at Timeleap, SonarSource, and Equip, enhancing user experience and driving business growth. Experienced in applying AI-driven tools for automated Twitter profile analysis. AWS Certified, currently pursuing Rust certifications to deepen backend expertise and expand technical versatility. Fluent in Portuguese and English, with working proficiency in French and German.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Led the development of decentralized applications using SvelteKit and TypeScript, generating 50k+ CHF in revenue within the first months of operation.
Built a Phaser-based staking portal game, optimizing performance and increasing user engagement.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Delivered three key features for SonarCloud's project section in React, improving Clean Code Taxonomy integration and user education on coding best practices.
Led CaYC team's adoption of 8 critical features, streamlining workflow efficiency and cross-team collaboration.
Migrated SonarCloud's issues screen to MIUI using React, enhancing UI consistency and user experience.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Enhanced Equip app's map search and rental processes, reducing prototype development time by 3 months.
Optimized Bluetooth connectivity for rental stations, increasing reliability from 20% to 100%.
Launched the Equip app on Play Store and Apple Store, expanding the company's reach in Switzerland, France, and the US.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Developed and enhanced Anibis Messenger using React and TypeScript, continuously improving user experience.
Migrated messaging services from Twilio to Sendbird, ensuring full adoption by 100% of users in the first month.
Served as Scrum Master for the Aldrin squad, driving team productivity and communication efficiency.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Built 3 React components for Adobe Content Manager, enhancing content workflows for energy companies in Germany and the UK.
Developed new features for the SkyQ application (British Sky Broadcasting), improving user experience and availability across Germany and Austria.
Designed and deployed key features for SkyQ on PlayStation 4, expanding product reach via successful store releases.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Built DataRisk's first frontend application from scratch using React and Redux, turning the company's vision into a working product.
Led frontend development, collaborating with designers to launch the company's first beta product, securing initial customers.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Developed key features in JavaScript and jQuery for the Landing Pages team, enhancing product quality and customer experience.
Migrated the landing pages editor to a WYSIWYG interface, improving usability and design flexibility.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Developed features for a JIRA testing management plugin using Angular.js, helping Kanoah secure its first international customers.
Led frontend development for testing suites, improving Kanoah's market competitiveness.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Developed core features for a Java-based file processing tool, improving data analysis capabilities and strengthening Softplan's reputation in financial software.
Built interactive JavaScript and CSS interfaces, enhancing user experience and usability.
